name: The horned skull of the dragonking
data: It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has nice armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
